mapper.select: WITH comment_recusive(LV, comment_id, parentcomment_id, uname, comment_text) AS ( SELECT 0 AS LV, comment_id, parentcomment_id, uname, comment_text FROM comments WHERE parentcomment_id = 0 AND recipe_id = #{_parameter} UNION ALL SELECT CR.LV + 1 AS LV, C.comment_id, C.parentcomment_id, C.uname, C.comment_text FROM comment_recusive CR LEFT OUTER JOIN comments C ON C.parentcomment_id = CR.comment_id WHERE C.parentcomment_id != 0 AND recipe_id = #{_parameter} ) SEARCH DEPTH FIRST BY comment_id SET ORDER_DEPTH SELECT * FROM comment_recusive ORDER BY ORDER_DEPTH
